prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Pipe, Strings, Guitar, Bass, Chromatic Percussion, Synth Lead, Piano, but without Drums.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Pipe, Strings, Guitar, Bass, Chromatic Percussion, Synth Lead, and Piano, but no Drums.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Pipe, Strings, Guitar, Bass, Chromatic Percussion, Synth Lead, and Piano, omitting Drums.

Style 3:
This composition is comprised of Pipe, Strings, Guitar, Bass, Chromatic Percussion, Synth
